TermDefinition.DefinitionText: An enzyme produced by the prostate. It may be found in increased amounts in men who have prostate cancer. Also called PAP.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "prostatic acid phosphatase"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "fosfatasa ácida prostática"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Enzima producida por la próstata. Se puede encontrar en cantidades elevadas en hombres que padecen de cáncer de próstata. También se llama FAP.
